item.title: Vectors and Data Types
item.description: Vectors Vectors are the basic building block of all data structures in R. All vectors have a length and type. There are no scalars in R only vectors of length 1. This lab will go through constructing them, subsetting them and then their various data types. 2 #numeric vector of length 1 c(2,5,8) #numeric vector of length 3 1:5 #numeric sequence of length 5 seq(from=1, to=9, by=2) #numeric sequence by 2 rep(2,5) #numeric repeated c('a'=1, 'b'=2, 'c'=3) #named numeric vector ## [1] 2 ## [1] 2 5 8 ## [1] 1 2 3 4 5 ## [1] 1 3 5 7 9 ## [1] 2 2 2 2 2 ## a b c ## 1 2 3 Subsetting You can select elements form a vector by position, value, or name.
